description: Fixed Bug #1 (P0): File watcher now persists embeddings to SQLite and updates HNSW index incrementally. File edits are now immediately visible in semantic search without manual reindex. Implementation: Modified handlers.rs to capture embeddings from embed_symbols_batch(), persist via bulk_store_embeddings(), and update HNSW with insert_batch(). All 1747 tests passing, zero regressions.
